headline: Assessing Truist Financial (TFC) Valuation After Recent Share Price Cooling And Discount To Fair Value
summary: Recent performance snapshot Truist Financial (TFC) has drawn attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing a 1.5% decline over the past day and a 0.8% decline over the past week. Over the past month, the stock shows a 2.3% decline, while the past 3 months reflect a 12.2% total return. This is set against full-year and multiyear total returns that remain in positive territory. headline: Truist Financial price target raised to $58 from $54 at Argus
summary: Argus raised the firm’s price target on Truist Financial (TFC) to $58 from $54 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after its Q4 earnings beat. headline: Here’s What Truist Financial Thinks About Fortinet, Inc (FTNT)
